name: Cloud
body:
## Welcome to Xinmin's GitHub Page(s).
I've no real idea what I'm doing, but supposedly, this automatic page generator is the easiest way to create beautiful pages for all of my projects. I just have to change some of my page content using a text editor, select a template crafted by a designer, and publish. Since I've never published a webpage before, this is really a first for me.

### Designer Templates
The templates are really quite nice although I'm still figuring this GitHub Flavored Markdown stuff out so that I can make proper changes. I was given the option to create a page manually but that sounds rather troublesome and too adventurous for my limited html skills at this point in time.

## Ubiquitous Cat aka Sleepy Kitten
Since I clearly have nothing else meaningful to say, here's the ubiquitous sleepy kitten you'll see in all my projects:
![Unfortunately, this is not my cat.](http://31.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m5lg6kIm8p1rxdhn1o1_500.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
